GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: 這架~o~飛機~w~將會在~y~等待航線~w~上停留幾分鐘，然後再~y~嘗試降落~w~。
GENERAL.NOTIFICATION: 一架飛機正在~r~緊急降落~w~於~y~{0}~w~。前往指定的降落區域並等待進一步指示。
這架~o~飛機~w~現在被授權進行~r~緊急降落~w~。
現場已經代碼4，因為~g~飛機安全降落~w~在~y~{0}~w~。
與~y~飛行員~w~交談並調查情況。
飛機已經降落。~y~與飛行員交談~w~以確認一切正常。
我們~r~無法生成飛機~w~。請重試呼叫或聯繫支持。
我們已經~y~失去與飛機~w~雷達定位的~o~聯繫~w~。嘗試建立~y~目視~w~飛機的~o~聯繫~w~。
我們已經~g~恢復與飛機~w~雷達定位的~o~聯繫~w~。
這架~o~飛機~w~已經~r~墜毀~w~。請稍候，我們將引導您前往墜機現場。找到後，請按您認為合適的方式繼續。

OUTCOME0.FURTHERINFORMATION: 一架~o~飛機~w~遇到~y~引擎問題~w~。前往降落區域並準備迎接飛機降落。

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~y~飛行員:~w~ 謝謝你，警官！你覺得降落怎麼樣？
~b~你:~w~ 對於一個引擎冒煙的人來說，不錯！
~y~飛行員:~w~ 我很感激你來確保一切正常。你需要什麼嗎？
~b~你:~w~ 不需要，我們只是想確保萬一有什麼問題。
~y~飛行員:~w~ 我得讓我的機械師看看引擎。如果我再在空中多待幾分鐘，我不知道是否能安全降落。
~b~你:~w~ 你今天做得很好。我會讓你處理你的飛機，保重。
~y~飛行員:~w~ 謝謝你，警官。保重，對不起造成麻煩！

OUTCOME1.FURTHERINFORMATION: 一名乘客在~o~飛機~w~上~r~死亡~w~。與飛行員交談以確定情況是否~y~可疑~w~。

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~b~你:~w~ 你好，機長。你能告訴我在空中發生了什麼嗎？
~y~飛行員:~w~ 當然...我帶我的朋友去飛行，他們在空中突然昏倒了。
~b~你:~w~ 你能具體說說嗎？
~y~飛行員:~w~ 我當時專注於飛行，因為今天空域很繁忙，然後我回頭一看，他們已經沒有反應了。我隨即在這裡緊急降落。
~b~你:~w~ 你的朋友有告訴你他們有什麼健康問題嗎？
~y~飛行員:~w~ 說實話，我們從來沒有談過這個。我只是以為他們的健康狀況足以飛行...
~b~你:~w~ 這裡現在是一個犯罪現場，我需要調查。可以嗎？
~y~飛行員:~w~ 當然可以，警官，我會全力配合。

OUTCOME2.NOTIFICATION: 這架 ~o~飛機~w~ 隨時有可能 ~y~爆炸~w~。與飛行員交談並立即開始疏散！
這架 ~o~飛機~w~ 已經 ~r~爆炸~w~。請視情況繼續行動。

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~b~你:~w~ 快從飛機下來，跟著我！快點！

OUTCOME3.FURTHERINFORMATION: 一架 ~o~飛機~w~ 正遭遇 ~y~引擎故障~w~，需要緊急降落。~n~報告顯示 ~r~跑道被阻塞~w~。在飛機降落前請立即清理！
OUTCOME3.NOTIFICATION: 在 ~o~飛機~w~ 嘗試降落前先移動障礙物，然後與飛行員交談。

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~y~飛行員:~w~ 差點就出大事了，感謝你及時清理跑道。
~b~你:~w~ 沒問題，我們很高興能及時移走障礙物。飛機狀況如何？
~y~飛行員:~w~ 還算不錯，引擎故障影響很大，但我們成功降落了。
~b~你:~w~ 在這種情況下，你的表現相當出色。
~y~飛行員:~w~ 謝謝，這也算是工作的一部分吧。
~b~你:~w~ 確實如此。我們很高興你們平安無事。需要任何幫助嗎？
~y~飛行員:~w~ 不用了，我們應該能處理，地勤人員已在趕來的路上。
~b~你:~w~ 好的，如果有需要，隨時通知我們。
~y~飛行員:~w~ 會的，再次感謝你的幫助，警官。

OUTCOME4.FURTHERINFORMATION: An ~o~aircraft~w~ is reporting an emergency due to a ~y~suspected stowaway~w~ onboard. Apprehend the aircraft upon landing.
OUTCOME4.NOTIFICATION: Checking to see if ~y~any prisoners have escaped~w~ in the last 24 hours. Standby.
We can confirm a ~y~{0}~w~ escaped from prison in the last 24 hours. Suspect is still at large.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~b~You:~w~ Hey there, how can we help?
~y~Pilot:~w~ While I was flying I heard some shuffling in my aircraft. And it sounded like an animal.
~b~You:~w~ Have you left your aircraft unattended recently?
~y~Pilot:~w~ Yes, I don't have a hanger so I left it out for a few days.
~b~You:~w~ What do you think it might be?
~y~Pilot:~w~ Well Officer, I have my suspicions that I have a stowaway onboard. I didn't want to check, but if you can search my plane I'd appreciate it.
~b~You:~w~ Let me just check something with Dispatch.
~b~You:~w~ I'm going to search your aircraft now.
~b~You:~w~ Don't move! What do you think you're doing here?
~r~Stowaway:~w~ Oh, uh...I was just trying to get somewhere. Look, you've got the wrong person.
~b~You:~w~ Save it, you're not as sneaky as you think. We know who you are.
~r~Stowaway:~w~ I swear Officer, I didn't mean any harm. I just needed a way out.
~b~You:~w~ A way out? Well you've certainly found one. Running around with a warrant on your head is a way back to the cells.
~r~Stowaway:~w~ Please, you gotta understand. It's complicated.
~b~You:~w~ Complicated doesn't excuse breaking the law. You're coming with me.

OUTCOME5.FURTHERINFORMATION: An ~o~aircraft~w~ is reporting an emergency due to a ~y~smashed window~w~ that occured during flight. Head to the landing area and prepare for the aircraft's landing.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~y~Pilot:~w~ Officer, thanks for being here. That was one heck of a landing.
~b~You:~w~ No problem, Captain. We got the call about your window. Are you alright?
~y~Pilot:~w~ Yeh, just a bit shaken. Never had a window shatter like that mid-flight.
~b~You:~w~ You handled it well, though. How did you manage to stay calm?
~y~Pilot:~w~ Years of training, I guess. It was all about keeping focus and getting us down safely.
~b~You:~w~ Well you certainly did a great job. We had emergency services on standby just in case. Glad we didn't need them.
~y~Pilot:~w~ Me too. Thanks for your help, I appreciate it.
~b~You:~w~ Anytime, Captain. That's what we are here for. Take care, let us know if you need anything else.

OUTCOME6.FURTHERINFORMATION: An ~o~aircraft~w~ is making an emergency landing due to ~y~bad weather conditions~w~. Head to the landing area and prepare for the aircraft's landing.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~y~Pilot:~w~ Whew, that was quite a landing.
~b~You:~w~ Are you alright Captain? That storm came out of nowhere.
~y~Pilot:~w~ Yeah. The weather radar didn't do justice to the turbulence out there.
~b~You:~w~ You did a remarkable job bringing her down safely. We were worried about you.
~y~Pilot:~w~ Thanks Officer. I appreciate you being here to ensure everything went smoothly. It was touch and go for a moment.
~b~You:~w~ Glad you're safe. Let me know if you need assistance with anything.
~y~Pilot:~w~ Thanks again. I'll talk to ATC once we're ready to move. Hopefully the weather lets up soon.
~b~You:~w~ Fingers crossed. Take care Captain and good job again.
